description: How do we create poetry, fiction and nonfiction that engages the reader and effectively communicates deeper meaning? In this course students develop a broad foundation of strategies underlying good creative writing. Risk taking and experimentation are encouraged. Students practice "the practice" of creative writing through extensive exercises. Students also read examples of contemporary poetry, fiction and nonfiction. Prerequisite: prior or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
name: Craft of Creative Writing
notes: This course has class year limits.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: prior or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
title: The Craft of Creative Writing
